news_header: Overtime and shift bans have been declared in various industrial sectors to expedite collective bargaining.
news_text: The Federation of Industry has announced overtime and shift bans in several sectors, including technology and chemical industries, to accelerate collective bargaining. These bans will take effect immediately and last until March 2, 2025, with specific bans in the mechanical forest industry ending on February 9, 2025. The aim is to improve working conditions and purchasing power for workers, while emergency work is exempt from these bans.
